sprint_goal: Establish the core application architecture, IPC, and implement the fundamental user login and role-based access system.
Build out the core administrative user management features, including creation, audit logging, password policies and resets.
Implement the critical DICOM C-STORE SCP functionality, including the full asynchronous ingestion pipeline for receiving studies.
Develop the high-performance DICOM viewer, delivering the core image rendering and manipulation tools.
